rules.prepare:
export MACHINE="`echo $BOLT_HOST_TYPE | cut -d'-' -f1`"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" $BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/config \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --cross-compile-prefix="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-" \ --openssldir="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/ssl" \ --libdir=lib \ \ no-idea no-mdc2 no-rc5 no-zlib no-ssl3 no-ssl3-method \ no-async enable-rfc3779 enable-cms
rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
mkdir -p "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/ssl"
for item in certs openssl.cnf private; do mv "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/ssl/$item" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/ssl/" ln -s "/etc/ssl/$item" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/ssl/" done
chmod 0700 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/ssl/private"
